post:
VyprNetworks is a friendly, reliable, and secure environment for your dedicated hosting needs! We closely monitor and maintain our servers, ensuring optimum performance for all our valued customers, and their visitors. 

**Our Dallas Dedicated Servers**
    
**HP Proliant DL380 G5 2x Intel Xeon E5450**

- 8x3.00GHz CPUs
- 16GB DDR3 RAM
- 2x300GB SAS 15K RPM
- UnMetered@100Mbps Bandwidth
- [$35.00 Monthly](https://vyprnetworks.com/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=62&carttpl=standard_cart)

**HP Proliant DL380 G6 2x Intel Xeon E5550**

- 8x2.67GHz CPUs
- 12GB DDR3RAM
- 2x300GB SAS 15K RPM
- UnMetered@100Mbps Bandwidth
- [$45.00 Monthly](https://vyprnetworks.com/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=63&carttpl=standard_cart)

With VyprNetworks DDoS Protection, we are able to mitigate layer 3 & 4 attacks as well as the effectively protect against layer 7 attacks also. To be sure our network is up to par we only use top of the line hardware for our cabinets. We use a Juniper EX4200 Switch as well as a Juniper SRX210H Firewall switch. You can see a bit of how our network operates in the image below. 

![](http://i.imgur.com/UT6jmEC.png)

Also benefiting from Psychz internet firewalls and security we have our own router in place-double ISP which make our network redundant, not having to rely on Psychz to keep us up and running. 

    Network Test IP:  
    
    Dallas, Texas Looking Glass:
    http://lg.texas.psychz.net
    
    Questions & Concerns
